text: Pastorale 1943 is a 1978 Dutch World War II drama movie directed by Wim Verstappen and was based on the novel by Simon Vestdijk. It stars Frederik de Groot, Leen Jongewaard, Coen Flink, Sacco van der Made, Hein Boele, Bram van der Vlugt, Rutger Hauer, Bernard Droog. ==Other websites== * Category:1978 drama movies Category:1978 war movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Wim Verstappen
title: Pastorale 1943
